title: Add logo to main footer brand area

requirements.text: Update the main footer brand block (left column) to include the existing CCS logo image and align it with the footer brand text, matching the header’s branding pattern.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer left brand area renders the image /assets/generated/ccs-logo-square.dim_1024x1024.png with appropriate alt text (e.g., "CCS Logo").
Logo + brand text are horizontally aligned and visually balanced on desktop, and remain readable and well-spaced on mobile.
No changes are required to backend behavior or data models.

requirements.text: Ensure the footer brand/logo area uses consistent styling with the site’s existing design system (spacing, typography, and hover/focus behavior where applicable) without changing existing footer content or links.
acceptanceCriteria: All existing footer content remains present (description, quick links, contact info, social links, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution).
Footer layout remains responsive and does not overflow or clip at common breakpoints.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Adding new footer sections beyond the existing three-column structure.
Changing contact data, social link URLs, or backend lead/contact storage behavior.
